      Returns:

    • fillProductionBuffers

      public boolean fillProductionBuffers​(ProductionSlot ps)
      Inserts the production inputs and outputs of the selected slot into the relative buffer maps
      Called if the controller checks one slot at a time after the user fills all the question marks
      Parameters:
      ps - is the selected slot
      Returns:
      true if the add() finish without errors

    • hasEnoughInputResources

      public boolean hasEnoughInputResources​(PlayerBoard playerBoard)
      Checks if the user has enough resources altogether before the user starts to selected them (vault + deposit) in order to activate the production
      Returns:
      true if he has enough total resources

    • canProduce

      public boolean canProduce​(java.util.ArrayList<ResourceContainer> selectedResources) throws NotEnoughResources, DepositSlotMaxDimExceeded
      Checks if the user can produce by checking if the selected resources match the inputs of the activated production cards
      Parameters:
      selectedResources - are the resources selected by the user
      Returns:
      true if the selected resources are equals to the input resources needed to produce
      Throws:
      NotEnoughResources - if there are missing resources
      DepositSlotMaxDimExceeded - if the user selected too many resources

    • produce

      public boolean produce​(Vault vault)
      Sends the production output to the current player's vault
      Parameters:
      vault - is the current player's vault
      Returns:
      true if it adds the resources

    • hasEnoughDevelopmentCardsWith

      public boolean hasEnoughDevelopmentCardsWith​(int numberRequired, int level, Colour colour)
      Counts the active Development Cards with specific attributes
      Parameters:
      numberRequired - is the total amount of cards that must have a specific level and colour
      level - is the level required
      colour - is the color required
      Returns:
      true if the card's count is greater or equal compared to the numberRequired
